title: Draft Cisco CVE-2026-20127 Client Advisory
description: Write a branded advisory email for Capital Cyber clients about the CVSS 10.0 zero day actively exploited since 2023. Any client running Cisco SD-WAN needs to know.

title: Build CMMC Contract Tracker
description: Scrape PreVeil's running list of DoD solicitations requiring CMMC. Create a daily-updated tracking doc for client opportunities.

title: Create SLCGP Grant Opportunity Monitor
description: Set up automated daily scanning cron job for new SLCGP and cyber grant postings across Grants.gov and state portals.

title: Build Prospect Outreach List from Threat Intel
description: Match today's threat intel to client verticals (healthcare, defense, Cisco shops) for targeted outreach. Needs CRM access.

title: Auto-Update Dashboard Intel Feed
description: Wire the daily cron to push updated data/intel.json and data/tasks.json to GitHub so the dashboard stays current automatically.

title: Draft CMMC Readiness Pitch for Small DIB Suppliers
description: One-pager pitch doc targeting small defense contractors struggling with compliance (Reuters angle). For outreach campaigns.
